string-array.name: apartment1
string-array.item:
Description:
 Newly renovated studio apartment in serene, safe and secure environment in the St. Augustine area. Complete with hardwood floor stand up shower, dishwasher, stove and microwave. The apartment is available January 1, 2019. Please call if you would like to come see and/or if you have any questions. 

 Landlord Name: John Smith
 Type: Apartment
 Contract: 1 year
 Furnished: Yes
 Deposit and fees: $2,500
 Date available: 1/9
 Pets: No
 Amenities:AC, Parking, WiFi, Hot/Cold Water
